posts.body:
==Nobody lose hope==
8ch will soon return, and when it does it will be infested with literal '''hordes''' of redditors, cuckchanners and other retards. When that happens we must drive them all out. Our new host will without a doubt be spammed with emails telling them to shut us down because we're rayciss. We on the other hand must spam them with emails that support their decision in hosting 8chan and freedom of speech. 

Be prepared for the worst, but don't lose hope. 8chan will never fall. It is our **home**.

posts.subject: Do not lose hope
posts.body:
To the few of you who weren't tech illiterate cuckchanners and have managed to find this bunker, do not lose hope. CM has proved to not be that much of a faggot after all and along with Jim they will get our home back up online soon. The shootings were used as an excuse to bring us down because we're too much of a threat to the kikes and their plan of total information control. Everyone and their mother is after us, either because they're braindead sheep that follow the status quo or because they feel threatened by our existence. 

Once 8chan is back online, be prepared for the biggest wave of redditors and faggots that we've ever experienced. The site will get flooded as an attempt to suppress discussion, similar to what happened to cuckchan. Vols must remain vigilant and respond to this upcoming shitstorm, and anons need to counter this attack by following these simple rules:
>Do not respond to slide threads
>If you do respond, always sage
>Always report & hide slide threads/outsiders
>If truly needed, spam gore

'''Do not spread out to other obscure imageboards, it will only decrease our numbers.'''
/pol/ will need a new bo and vols. It can't remain a global-owned board, the moment it went that route it turned into cuckchan. We need some proper anons to claim it.

Without 8chan it feels like there is literally nothing to use the internet for. I keep unconsciously opening 8ch only to then remember that it's still down. Youtube sucks, social media suck, vidya forums suck, everything sucks with the exception of 8ch. I want our home back, /pol/.

>>41a95a6c-7b07-4eeb-b6f7-49ed5d115a77
You're right lad. But unfortunately I can't see how this place could ever flourish. Even with 8ch down the PPH jumps between 0 and 1. Once 8chan is back the PPH here will go to 0. Even if a few anons post, it won't be more than half a dozen.

posts.subject: Things just got even more serious
posts.body:
>The Homeland Security Committee has sent a letter to Jim, asking him to appear before congress and explain himself for all these "terrorists" in 8chan
Fuck, does he even have to go? He's living in the Philippines so they can't legally get to him, right?
https://archive.is/HLCjv

I set my limit too 100mb because I don't have a lot of space. Might increase it to 1 or 2GB though.

However, how do I blacklist the cp board?
